title: UBP CARDS TEAM - PERFORM RECONCILIATION AGAINST THE EXCEL SHEET APPLICATION FORMS CONCATENATION

task_list.instruction_title:
Please do the reconciliation using the file FTC_MOTEUR_SECLI_0061_CREDITCARDS 

5006_CUSTOMERSACCOUNTS_CUSTOMERS_CUSTOMERINFORMATION_005
5099_CUSTOMERSACCOUNTS_CUSTOMERS_EXCLUDEDCUSTOMERS_001
5103_CUSTOMERSACCOUNTS_ACCOUNTS_BASICINFO_001

against the Excel sheet (CUSTOMER/ACCOUNT) application Forms
